Title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
Writer: Johan Heldenbergh (play), Mieke Dobbels (play), Carl Joos (adaptation), Felix van Groeningen (adaptation), Charlotte Vandermeersch (collaboration on screenplay)
Actors: Johan Heldenbergh, Veerle Baetens, Nell Cattrysse, Geert Van Rampelberg
Plot: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 25 wins & 15 nominations.
